column4: Help!  I can no longer get clean su access and several devices are suddenly saying permission denied!!!!!
the message for several things is: "conversation with su failed."
yes  but makes no difference whether I try the root password for the sudo password.
it does in a way there is a reason why su is not enabled

Will do.  First discovered the problem when i logged in this morn & the system said it could not initialize sound /dev/dsp because permission denied.  Then I discovered I couldn't get sudo access nor su acces to all kinds of things.
drummer whos is named in the /etc/sudoers file?
I'll take a quick look there.
i really think the su is conflicting with sudo and now neither work but im not 100% on that

Ok I read the page.  How does that impact my situation?  I cannot run Synaptic nor several other packages - When I type in my sudo password - the package does not run.  I have NO sound, on boot it says permission denied for /dev/dsp  I can go on - but....
if enabling su screwed up your sudoers than i would suggest getting rid of su (people come in here all the time with su issues affecting sudo)
I can disable su access easily enough - but will that ficx the problem - (and if so How?)
if the 2 are conflicting it might but from what ive seen people having to add themselves again
Uh, if i do not have access to root and my current login sudo has screwed the pooch, how do I "add myself" again?
you are correct - I cannot run jack - my sudo access seems to be totally screwed.
